title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Locally Made Waakye
summary: Waakye is a classic Ghanaian dish made from rice and beans, cooked together with dried millet leaves for a natural reddish-brown color.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Chilli mania
summary: This fiery rice recipe combines fragrant basmati rice with a medley of chili peppers, savory spices, and hearty ingredients like vegetables, beans, or protein of your choice.
